column2: Thanks for the 5-star review! This has got to be one of our favorite reviews to date. I doubt the surgeon general would sign off on the curative powers of a bowl of ramen
column3: though I would say there's enough anecdotal evidence out there that a hot bowl of soup can do the body some good. I'm additionally pleased that our servers attended you and your party well
column4: and that you are understanding of the somewhat poorly worded contest being held by JINYA corporate. Thanks again
column5: and we look forward to serving you in the future.
